short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Linkfix adds a Copy Link button to Google Search results

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Linkfix adds a "Copy Link" button to Google Search results so you can actually copy links from the results page rather than visit the links and then get the URL.
